categoriesSection.We offer a variety: We offer a variety among our trailer models, tailored to various types of use.

coloredSection.It starts with: It starts with the design of the trailer, taking into account technical and functional specifications. Our team of engineers and designers work on creating an optimal project that meets our customers' expectations. After completing the design process, we proceed to the actual production. Our technologically advanced machines enable us to bend, cut, and shape various materials such as steel, aluminum, or synthetic materials, allowing us to create robust and durable trailer structures.
coloredSection.An essential stage: An essential stage of production is welding. In our company, we employ robotic welding, ensuring precision and reliability of welded joints. By using advanced welding robots, we create strong and durable connections that are essential for ensuring the safety and durability of the trailers.

summary.After completing: After completing the production process, the trailers undergo rigorous quality testing. We test various aspects, such as strength, safety, functionality, and compliance with industry standards. Only after successfully passing these tests, the trailers are ready to be delivered to our customers.

features.Our trailers: Our trailers are designed and manufactured with the highest precision and attention to detail.
features.We introduce: We introduce the latest technologies, such as intelligent security systems and advanced LED lighting.
features.We offer: We offer various trailer models tailored to different types of use.
features.As a new producer: As a new producer of trailers for personal vehicles, we strive to provide excellent customer service. Our qualified employees are ready to answer any questions and assist in choosing the right trailer that meets your expectations. We invite you to explore our offer and join the ranks of satisfied customers who enjoy safe, functional, and stylish trailers for personal vehicles.

intro.As a producer: As a producer of trailers for personal vehicles, we offer a diverse range of models tailored to various types of use. Whether you need a trailer for transporting luggage, sports equipment, camping gear, or any other cargo, we have the perfect solution for you.

contact.I agree to receive commercial through el: I agree to receive commercial information from Balhanger through electronic communication means, in accordance with the Act on the provision of electronic services, to the email address provided by me.*
contact.I also consent to receiving commercial t: I also consent to receiving commercial information from Balhanger through telecommunications end devices (telephone, Internet) and automatic calling systems, in accordance with the telecommunications law.*
contact.This consent is voluntary: *This consent is voluntary, granting consent will enable the company Balhanger Ltd. partnership., to send information about current offers and promotions related to their products. Consent can always be revoked by sending an email to: info@balhanger.com. In case of not checking the consents, we will contact you to discuss the terms of any potential further cooperation. Read more in the
contact.I consent to the processing of my person: I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act in connection with submitting an inquiry through the contact form. Providing the data is voluntary but necessary for processing the inquiry. I have been informed that I have the right to access my data, rectify it, and request its cessation of processing. The administrator of personal data is Balhanger Ltd. partnership.
contact.Select files: Select files or drag and drop them here

contact.We strongly encourage you: We are also ready to assist in the area of servicing our trailers, providing comprehensive technical support and repairs.
contact.Regardless: Regardless of the type of issue or maintenance required, our qualified technicians are ready to provide assistance.
contact.Furthermore: Furthermore, our range includes a wide selection of high-quality spare parts.
contact.This means: This means we can provide our customers with quick and efficient replacement or repair of parts to keep our products in excellent technical condition.
contact.With our experience: With our experience and access to a variety of spare parts, we are able to meet all of our customers' needs and provide them with full confidence in the performance and reliability of our trailers.

intro.Please use: Please use the BALHANGER logo and images responsibly and judiciously. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the distribution of materials, please feel free to contact the Marketing Department.
intro.All the images: All images presented on our website are for illustrative purposes. We have endeavored to accurately represent the appearance of our products. However, we would like to emphasize that the final product may slightly differ from the presented images. This is due to the specific individual requirements of our customers and optional equipment elements.

aboutProduction.How we create description: In our company, we have a modern machinery park that enables us to effectively and efficiently produce trailers for passenger cars. Our technologically advanced machines and robotic welding stations guarantee high quality and precision at every stage of production.
aboutProduction.A wide selection description: The production process begins with the design of the trailer, taking into account technical and functional specifications. Our team of engineers and designers works on creating an optimal project that meets the expectations of our customers.

aboutUs.About us description: We are proud to introduce our company, which specializes in the design and production of innovative trailers that perfectly fit passenger cars. We focus on delivering high-quality products that meet the highest standards of safety, functionality, and durability. Our trailers are designed with various needs and lifestyles of drivers in mind, ensuring reliability and comfort during travels.
aboutUs.Why us description: As a manufacturer of trailers for passenger cars, we offer a variety of models that are tailored to different types of usage. Whether you need a trailer for transporting luggage, sports equipment, camping gear, or any other cargo, we have the perfect solution for you.

homepage.title: Trailer manufacturer | Balhanger
homepage.description: We are a Polish company specializing in the production of various types of trailers - for cars, motorcycles, construction, boats and more. Our range includes a wide selection of high-quality trailers tailored to diverse needs. Explore our products today!
homepage.keywords: trailers, car trailers, trailer, car transporter, single-axle trailer, double-axle trailer, construction trailer

aboutPage.title: About us. Trailer manufacturer | Balhanger
aboutPage.description: We are a manufacturer of car trailers, a team of automotive enthusiasts. Our company focuses on delivering customers the highest quality solutions, individually tailored to their needs. Get to know our energetic team, dedication, and innovative approach to the transportation industry. Our goal is to provide reliable transport solutions that meet the expectations of even the most demanding customers.

contactPage.description: Need a reliable and safe car trailer? Benefit from our expertise and knowledge to match the perfect trailer to your needs. Contact us today, and our experts will promptly address all your queries, offering professional guidance in choosing the perfect solution for you.

Contact us to discover our full product range and receive expert guidance to choose the perfect solution for your business needs.
